comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Adrianople is an anglicized form of Hadrianopolis, a city currently in Turkey and known as Edirne.. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrianople See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bulgaria#The_Kingdom_of_Bulgaria for historical context about the Balkan Wars fought over territory in this area.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information about the place name.  We'll add it to the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: In the Balkan Wars this area of Thrace was fought over: the Battle of Adrianople: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Adrianople_(1913) the Wars: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balkan_wars
